Mahfud MD Nilai Pemakzulan Gibran Sulit Terwujud, Duga Ada Ancaman Terselubung Jokowi kepada Prabowo
content: - Wacana pemakzulan Wakil Presiden Raka yang diajukan oleh sejumlah purnawirawan TNI sampai saat ini belum ada kelanjutan pasti. Mantan Menteri Koordinator Politik, Hukum, dan Keamanan (Menko Polhukam), , menyebut proses tersebut kecil kemungkinan dapat terwujud, terutama karena faktor kekuatan politik Presiden dan pengaruh tersembunyi dari Presiden ke-7 RI, Joko Widodo (Jokowi). “Kalau dari sudut hukum moral, surat itu bagus. Tapi dari sudut politik, menurut saya, agaknya tidak jadi itu pemakzulan,” kata Mahfud, dikutip dari kanal YouTube Mahfud MD Official, Rabu (9/7/2025). Mahfud mengungkapkan, kekuatan politik yang dimiliki Presiden Prabowo jauh lebih besar dibandingkan para purnawirawan yang menginisiasi surat pemakzulan. Ia menilai, meskipun secara formal proses itu dapat berjalan, namun perdebatan akan panjang dan keberhasilannya sangat tergantung pada sikap politik Prabowo sendiri. “Kalau Pak Prabowo memberi sinyal untuk membiarkan partai-partai bersikap sesuai keyakinan politik mereka, tanpa intervensi, mungkin pemakzulan itu bisa berjalan,” ujarnya. “Tapi saya ragu, karena saya menangkap ada ancaman terselubung dari Pak Jokowi.” Mahfud menjelaskan pernyataannya dengan mengacu pada ucapan Jokowi yang menyebut pemakzulan wakil presiden tidak bisa dilakukan secara terpisah dari presiden, karena keduanya merupakan satu paket. Padahal, menurut Mahfud, konstitusi Indonesia tidak menyatakan demikian. “Pak Jokowi tahu, pasal 7A UUD 1945 bunyinya ‘presiden dan/atau wakil...

title: 전력수요 지난 8일 역대 2위..."올여름 최대 97.8GW 예상"
creator: 최지숙
content: 에어컨 매장 [연합뉴스 제공 자료사진] [연합뉴스 제공 자료사진] 이른 더위로 냉방기기 사용이 급증함에 따라 정부가 안정적 전력 수급을 위한 비상 체제에 들어갔습니다. 산업통상자원부는 오늘(10일) 국무총리주재 현안관계장관회의에서 '여름철 전력수급 전망 및 대책'을 발표했습니다. 산업통상자원부에 따르면 전력 수요는 지난 8일 18시 기준 95.7기가와트(GW)로 이미 역대 2위를 기록했습니다. 전력당국은 이번 여름철 최대 전력수요가 97.8기가와트까지 높아질 수 있을 것으로 전망했습니다. 냉방기기 사용을 시작하면 지속하는 경향이 있고, 통계적으로 8월 초 기온이 7월보다 더 높기 때문입니다. 다만 산업부는 전력 수요가 상한치까지 높아져도 예비력이 8.8기가와트로 전력당국이 관리 가능한 수준이라고 밝혔습니다. 폭우나 태풍 등으로 인한 설비 고장, 역대급 폭염 지속에 대비해 약 8.7기가와트의 비상자원도 별도로 준비했다는 설명입니다. 정부는 전력 사용에 어려움을 겪을 수 있는 저소득층 등 취약계층에 대해 지난 1일부터 연간 전체 에너지 바우처 지원액(최대 70만 1,300원)을 일괄 지급하고, 전기요금 감면 한도를 최대 월 2만원으로 확대했습니다. 또, 7~8월에 전기요금 누진제 구간을 완화해 냉방 사용에 따른 전기요금 부담을 전체적으로 줄이고 있다고 산업부는 전했습니다. 정부는 오늘(10일)부터 오는 9월 19일까지를 전력 수급 대책 기간으로 정하고, '전력 수급 종합상황실'을 운영합니다. 안덕근...

title: بلجيكا.. رفع أجور العاملات في المنازل بعد أشهر من المفاوضات
creator: شبكة دليل الريف
content: توصلت النقابات العمالية وأرباب العمل في بلجيكا إلى اتفاق جديد يقضي برفع أجور العاملات في المنازل بجهتي فلاندرن ووالونيا، ليحصلن على زيادة قدرها 77 سنتًا في الساعة، أي ما يعادل زيادة بنسبة 6% في الأجر الإجمالي. ويُتوقع أن تنعكس هذه الزيادة في أجور أكثر من 134 ألف عاملة منزلية ابتداءً من هذا الشهر، مع أثر رجعي يعود إلى شهر مارس الماضي، يرافقه صرف منحة تعويضية عن الأشهر الفائتة. وتأتي هذه الزيادة بعد أشهر من المفاوضات التي أعقبت رفع ثمن "الشيكات الخدمية" المستخدمة للدفع مقابل خدمات العاملات في المنازل بواحد يورو منذ يناير الماضي، حيث استمر الخلاف بشأن كيفية توزيع هذه الزيادة بين أرباب العمل والعاملات. ورغم إصرار أرباب العمل على أن تكلفة الزيادة تبلغ فعليًا 1.70 يورو للساعة بالنظر إلى الالتزامات الاجتماعية والضريبية، فقد تم الاتفاق في النهاية على أن تحصل العاملات على 77 سنتًا، في حين تُقدَّر الكلفة الإجمالية على أرباب العمل ب1.30 يورو للساعة. ويشمل الاتفاق أيضًا منحة تحفيزية للعاملات اللواتي يلجأن إلى إجازات التفرغ المؤقت أو الإجازات الموضوعاتية. وقد أشادت النقابات بالاتفاق، معتبرةً إياه خطوة في اتجاه الإنصاف، لا سيما وأن العديد من العاملات في المنازل من النساء الوحيدات اللواتي يحتجن إلى كل يورو لتحسين معيشتهن. وجاء هذا الاتفاق بوساطة من وزيرة العمل في فلاندرن زوهال ديمير ووزير الاقتصاد في والونيا بيير-إيف جوهوليه، حيث أكدا أن الوقت قد حان لمنح العاملات في المنازل أجورًا أكثر عدلًا، خاصة وأن الكثير من الأسر تعتمد على خدماتهن لتدبير شؤونها اليومية. وفي المقابل، لا تزال العاملات في العاصمة بروكسيل محرومات من هذه الزيادة بسبب غياب حكومة...

title: 대한상의 "전문가 102명, 올해 성장률 전망치 0.88%"
creator: 배진솔
content: 경제전문가가 본 향후 5년간의 한국경제 성장 추세 전망 [대한상공회의소 제공] [대한상공회의소 제공] 미국의 통상 정책 리스크와 내수 침체 등 우리 경제가 복합 위기에 직면한 가운데 경제전문가 10명 중 6명이 앞으로 우리 경제의 성장동력이 약해질 것으로 봤습니다. 대한상공회의소는 최근 국내 경제·경영 전문가 102명을 대상으로 ‘새정부 경제정책방향’을 조사하고 그 결과를 오늘(10일) 발표했습니다. 전문가들은 내년부터 앞으로 5년간 우리나라의 성장 추세에 대한 전망을 묻는 질문에 40.2%가 성장률이 '낮은 수준에서 정체되는 L자형'을 보일 것으로 우려했습니다. 다음 21.6%는 '점진적인 우하향' 추세를 나타낼 것이라고 응답했습니다. 전문가 61.8%가 우리 경제의 성장동력이 약해질 것이라고 본 것입니다. 성장률이 반등할 것이라는 의견은 '점진적 상승'이 17.6%, '초기에 낮으나 갈수록 회복'이 16.7%로 상대적으로 적었습니다. 올 한해의 경제성장률 전망치를 묻는 질문에 대한 전문가들 답변의 산술평균은 0.88%로 집계돼, 한국은행과 KDI의 최근 전망(0.8%)과 비슷한 수준을 보였습니다. 새정부가 5년간 우선 추진해야 할 과제 [대한상공회의소 제공] [대한상공회의소 제공] 이재명 정부가 임기 내 추진해야 할 과제 중 가장 필요한 정책으로는 '전략산업 집중적 투자지원’이 59.8%로 가장 많았습니다. 뒤이어 ▲ 산업 전반 AI 기술 적용 확대(38.3%) ▲ 민간 R&D·설비투자 지원 확대(25.5%) ▲ 신산업·신기술을...

title: Akhiri Lawatan Bertemu Presiden Lula da Silva, Prabowo Tinggalkan Brasilia
content: Jakarta Kunjungan kenegaraan dengan bertemu Presiden Brasil Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva mengakhiri agenda Presiden RI Prabowo Subianto di Brasilia. Usai pertemuan, Prabowo langsung meninggalkan Brasil. Dikutip Biro Sekretariat Presiden, Pesawat Garuda Indonesia-1 yang membawa Prabowo dan rombongan terbatas lepas landas dari Pangkalan Udara Brasilia, pada Rabu (9/7) pukul 17.20 waktu setempat. Tampak melepas keberangkatan Prabowo secara resmi yaitu Secretary For Asia Pasific Susan Kleebank, Duta Besar Brasil untuk Indonesia George Prata, Director of India South and South East Asia Everton Lucero, serta Komandan Pangkalan Udara Brasilia Kolonel Nicolas. SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT Baca juga: Prabowo Sebut RI-Brasil Ingin Kolaborasi Bikin Rudal dan Kapal Selam Selain itu, turut melepas pula Duta Besar Luar Biasa dan Berkuasa Penuh Republik Indonesia untuk Republik Federasi Brasil Eddy Yusup yang didampingi oleh Atase Pertahanan RI untuk Brasil Kolonel Inf. Rizal Ashwan. Diketahui, selama di Brasil, Prabowo menghadiri KTT BRICS di Rio de Janeiro pada tanggal 6 dan 7 Juli 2025. Kemudian dilanjutkan dengan kunjungan kenegaraan di Brasilia dengan bertemu Presiden Brasil Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva di Istana Planalto pada 9 Juli 2025. ADVERTISEMENT Prabowo melakukan pertemuan 4 mata dan bilateral dengan Presiden Brasil Lula da Silva. Agenda dilanjutkan dengan jamuan makan siang bersama Presiden Lula di Itamaraty, Kompleks Kementerian Luar Negeri Brasil, Brasilia. Baca juga:...

title: Siap-siap PLN Lakukan Pemeliharaan Jaringan 6 Jam Hari Ini Kamis 10 Juli 2025 di Jateng DIY
content: Pihak PLN diketahui akan melakukan sementara di sejumlah titik, hal ini diinformasikan bagi masyarakat terkait pemadaman tersebut. Pemadaman listrik yang dilakukan di sejumlah titik di masing-masing wilayah memiliki durasi yang berbeda, lantaran perbedaan jenis pekerjaan yang dilakukan secara berkala oleh petugas PLN. Adapun pemadaman listrik dilakukan adalah demi kelancaran penggunaan listrik para pengguna hingga keamanan masyarakat maupun petugas. Dilakukan penggantian konstruksi PBPD mulai pukul 10.00 hingga 13.00 WIB sehingga dilakukan pemadaman di sejumlah wilayah di Jalan Tirtopuran, Jalan Mj Sutoyo, Jalan Prawirotaman, Jalan Parangtritis Pasar Prawirotaman, Danunegaran dan sekitarnya. Dilakukan pemeliharaan jaringan mulai pukul 10.00 hingga 13.00 WIB sehingga dilakukan pemadaman di sejumlah wilayah di Demen, Kedundang, Jombokan, Trukan, Tawangsari, Kopok, Tegalperang dan sekitarnya. Dilakukan pemeliharaan jaringan dan penggantian LBS mulai pukul 10.00 hingga 13.00 WIB sehingga dilakukan pemadaman di sejumlah wilayah di Dusun Jambon, Nusupan, Baturan Lor, Jambon, Ngawen, Trini, Donokitri, Perumahan Lavender, Perumahan Dehanggo Mansion, Perumahan Villa Terakota, Jalan Kabupaten, Perumahan Alamanda dan sekitarnya.

title: Los primeros Sanfermines novelados cumplen un siglo
Villanueva Wins South Dakota Junior Pre-Teen Title
creator: By Cora Van Olson cs.vanolson@gmail.com
content: A Yankton girl who recently shined in a regional beauty pageant is headed for the national event. Laura Villanueva, 10, of Yankton was crowned the South Dakota Junior Pre-Teen winner at the National American Miss (NAM) beauty pageant last month in Madison, Wisconsin. Villanueva, who has been a dancer for years, never considered participating in a beauty pageant before, but a surprise invitation to the NAM pageant caught her interest, her father, Mike Villanueva, told the Press & Dakotan. “She was in a Dance Xtreme (DX) competition in Minnesota,” he said. “What we think happened is one of the people from (the NAM) contest was at the DX competition, and that’s how she got the invitation.” According to its website, the NAM pageant aims to increase contestant confidence and teach real-world skills, including interviewing, public speaking and presenting in front of an audience. “I decided I wanted to do it because I like acting and I like making new friends and meeting new people,” Laura Villanueva told the Press & Dakotan. There were several optional events, including Fun Fitness and Casual Wear, but the Formal Wear, Interview and Introduction events were required, she said. “Introduction is where you go on stage and say where you’re from, what’s your name and a fun fact about you. My fun fact was, I want to be a doctor when I grow up,” said Villanueva, whose mother, Mary Villanueva, is a doctor in Yankton. Mike is a Yankton City Commissioner and volunteer firefighter. The...

title: Former Wrestling Coach Convicted for Failing to Protect Students
creator: Zainuddin Harinder
content: HARRISBURG, PA — A Blair County jury has found former Bellwood Antis School District varsity wrestling coach Timothy Andrekovich guilty of endangering the welfare of a child, Pennsylvania Attorney General Dave Sunday announced this week. The conviction follows a two-day trial during which prosecutors argued that Andrekovich, 59, failed to adequately protect students under his supervision after being made aware of an ongoing investigation into serious allegations against junior high wrestling coach Ryan Blazier. The jury returned its verdict late Tuesday afternoon. Sentencing is scheduled for August 25. According to evidence presented in court, Blazier was under investigation for child sexual abuse as early as December 2019. During that period, Andrekovich was responsible for implementing a safety plan designed to limit Blazier’s contact with students. Prosecutors contended that Andrekovich did not properly enforce this plan, ultimately allowing Blazier to continue unsupervised interactions with young athletes. Attorney General Sunday emphasized the breach of trust inherent in Andrekovich’s actions. “As head wrestling coach, the defendant was supposed to be looking out for his wrestlers. Instead, when notified of a potential threat, he abdicated his responsibility to protect those students,” Sunday stated. Blazier was later convicted of sexual assault and received a lengthy prison sentence in June 2023. The case against Andrekovich was prosecuted by Deputy Attorney General...

title: Couple Discusses Solar Home, Prairie Restoration At Sierra Club Meeting
creator: By Jay Gravholt jay.gravholt@yankton.net
content: Jerry and Norma Wilson were both educators and have always been environmentalists. When they moved to a little patch of prairie northwest of Vermillion in 1982, they started what would be a long, laborious job of building a passive solar home, revitalizing the wildflowers on the property and stabilizing a log cabin on the property that was built by Norwegian immigrants in 1869. The couple presented a program on their journey during the Sierra Club’s June meeting. About 30 people attended the event. According to Norma, the couple had attended the Dakota Conference earlier this year at Augustana University and one of the topics was “settling and resettling.” “I thought, ‘Well, that’s what we did,’” she said. “So, we decided to do this presentation on our experience of coming to South Dakota from another place and settling here.” Norma explained that the couple had first moved to Vermillion in 1978 when she had been hired to teach Native American Literature at the University of South Dakota. Jerry would be a long-time professor at Mount Marty. “We really wanted to live in the country, but we didn’t find a country place,” she told the audience. “We just bought this little house (that) had been built in 1883 by a Scandinavian immigrant who had operated a hotel of sorts down by the river. When the flood came in 1881, it floated his house down the river to Burbank. When the flooding subsided, he took it apart and he built two houses, and this was one of them.” While living in that...

title: Del relato propio al cambio colectivo: así es la mirada de las mujeres que lideran con propósito
content: El mundo necesita referentes femeninos visibles en todos los ámbitos. Mujeres cuya trayectoria y voz sirvan de inspiración a las generaciones que vienen, como modelos en los que las niñas de hoy puedan reconocerse para construir el mañana. Desde esa mirada se ha celebrado el foro “Mujeres que inspiran”, un proyecto impulsado por El Confidencial, en colaboración con Quirónsalud, Philip Morris, AstraZeneca y Fundación La Caixa, que busca visibilizar el papel de la mujer como agente clave en la transformación y evolución de la sociedad.En él han participado destacadas profesionales del mundo de la política, el periodismo, la empresa y el tercer sector, que han compartido con el público sus historias, aprendizajes y desafíos, y que han coincidido en la importancia de foros de este tipo que den voz a la mujer y sirvan de inspiración a la sociedad."En el siglo XIX, la lucha por la igualdad era evidente; la nuestra, ahora, es, a veces, invisible", Sonsoles ÓnegaEl punto de arranque del encuentro, conducido por la periodista de El Confidencial Marta García Aller, ha sido una entrevista con la escritora y periodista Sonsoles Ónega. Bajo el lema ‘Narrar lo que somos: mujeres, sociedad y la conquista de los relatos’, la ganadora del Premio Planeta ha comenzado defendiendo “el derecho a equivocarnos. title: Gracias a la joven que recuperó mi cartera en San Fermín
Dockendorf Wins National Writing Awards
creator: From P&D Staff Reports
content: Press & Dakotan reporter Randy Dockendorf has won numerous awards in the National Newspaper Association Foundation’s 2025 Better Newspaper Contest. Dockendorf, competing in the daily division (except where noted), won a total of 13 awards, including five first-place citations. He won first place for Best Localized National Story, Best Coverage of Military Affairs (Daily & Non-daily Division, circ. 5,000 or more), Best Breaking News Story, Best Business Feature Story and Best Sports Story. He won second place for Best Localized National Story, Best Education/Literacy Story and Best Sports Story. Dockendorf won third place for Best Non-Profile Feature Story, Best Profile Feature Story and Preserving Local History story. He also won honorable mentions for Best Education/Literacy Story and Best Sports Story. Winners will be recognized at the awards ceremony held Friday, Oct. 10, during NNAF’s 139th annual Convention & Trade Show in Minneapolis.

title: La jota navarra ameniza las calles
Project Prison Reset Updates Shared At Yankton Forum
creator: By Mark Mahoney mark.mahoney@yankton.net
content: Two Project Prison Reset Task Force members provided updates on Wednesday in Yankton on the selection of Sioux Falls as the site for a new men’s state prison facility in South Dakota. During a forum hosted by the local Republican Friends group at the Yankton Elks Lodge, Yankton Police Chief Jason Foote and Legislative District 8 State Rep. Tim Reisch (R-Howard) spoke about the activities and discussions of the task force. Former District 18 State Sen. Jean Hunhoff of Yankton served as the moderator and had a list of questions for the two men to answer. The task force, appointed by Gov. Larry Rhoden, held its final meeting on Tuesday and made a final recommendation for a new men’s state prison facility to replace the 144-year-old South Dakota State Penitentiary, located in Sioux Falls, the state’s largest city. Meeting in Sioux Falls, the task force unanimously recommended that state lawmakers back a new men’s state prison facility at a cost of no more than $650 million. A special session of the South Dakota Legislature originally scheduled for July 22 has been delayed and had not been rescheduled as of Wednesday afternoon. According to South Dakota Searchlight, the buildings on the recommended prison campus should be designed to last 100 years, the task force decided, with 1,200 beds for higher-security inmates and another 300 beds for lower-security inmates. “That was a really tough discussion because of the cost of the prison,” Foote said. “The more beds you put in, the...

title: Legion Offering Free Grocery Delivery
content: The Yankton American Legion is once again offering free delivery of groceries to elderly and disabled within the Yankton city limits. The Legion has conducted this program for more than 40 years. Orders must be called in by Tuesday mornings and will be delivered Wednesday mornings. If you are interested and eligible to have your groceries delivered by the Legion, or if you have any other questions, contact Fran Johnson at 760-5941.

title: DHHS Offers Tips to Stay Safe and Healthy While Swimming
content: LINCOLN, Neb. — The Nebraska Department of Health and Human Services (DHHS) urges residents to prioritize safety and health to reduce the risk of illness and injury when enjoying water-related activities in pools, lakes and rivers. “Drowning can happen quickly and without warning,” said Dr. Sydney Stein, DHHS State Epidemiologist. “To keep everyone safe while enjoying water activities this summer, always keep children within arm’s reach, use properly fitted life jackets, avoid swimming during and for two weeks after if you have an illness with diarrhea, and follow the buddy system. Enrolling kids in swim lessons and installing pool barriers such as self-closing or self-latching gates can make a lifesaving difference.” ——— PREVENT WATER-RELATED ILLNESS • Avoid swimming when ill. Do not swim if you have diarrhea or open wounds. • Shower before swimming. Rinse off to remove dirt and oils before swimming. • Avoid swallowing water. Refrain from drinking from pools or natural bodies of water. ——— SAFE PRACTICES FOR POOLS • Water Watcher. Assign an adult to maintain constant supervision and avoid any distractions. • Check pool conditions. Ensure drains are visible and covers are secure. • Install barriers. Use fences at least four feet high with self-latching, self-closing gates. • Keep rescue equipment handy. Have a life ring, reaching pole, and phone nearby in case of emergencies. • Inspect chemical levels. Verify that chlorine or bromine levels and pH are within safe ranges....

title: Fotos del pasacalles de Navarjota este miércoles 9 de julio
Library Outreach Has Impact
creator: By Jeremy Hoeck Yankton Community Library
content: The following is written from the perspectives of two patrons of the Yankton Community Library, which offers a free monthly outreach service within Yankton city limits to homebound patrons. Their first names have been changed, but the stories remain true! Whether it’s regular print books, large print books, audiobooks, movies or CDs, library staff look forward to visiting those patrons on the first Wednesday of each month. ——— Bernice I was so worried that I wouldn’t be able to read anymore. Beyond worried, actually. I’m at the age now — though I can hardly believe it — where I can’t drive my car anymore, and it’s becoming hard for me to go up and down the stairs in my apartment building. My family keeps suggesting that I consider moving, but this is my home; I’ve been here almost three decades! How would I make it to the library? I’ve used the library here in Yankton for almost 60 years, and I loved being able to hop in my car and drive downtown whenever I was out of books. I had that freedom. That’s not the case anymore. I’m cooped up in my apartment. Yes, my son lives in Yankton and is so helpful with my groceries and taking me to my appointments, but I miss the library. But guess what? A friend of mine who used to live on the ground floor of my apartment before she passed away told me that the library would bring me books. I couldn’t believe it! One morning when I was thinking of it, I called the library and a nice gal told me that yes, they have something called...

title: YAWC Event Slated For July 15
content: “Sparks of Freedom” is the theme for the July Yankton Area Women’s Connection (YAWC) meeting at 6:30 p.m. on Tuesday, July 15, at Yankton’s River Rock Event Center, 2901 Broadway, Yankton. YAWC offers women of all ages in Yankton and the surrounding area the opportunity to encourage and inspire one another while enjoying a fun time of fellowship and friendship. The July 15 meeting will feature a meal, music in sign language by Jeannie Kasik (Yankton), a special feature titled “Paul Revere’s Ride” by Jeanie Stibral (Yankton) and Lisa Story (Wausa, Nebraska), and speaker, Lori Mayer of St. Ansgar, Iowa, presenting “What are You Looking For?” There is a cost to attend, payable at the door. Reservations are required to attend the event. Call 402-254-2102 or call or text 605-660-0378 by July 13. YAWC is affiliated with Stonecroft, a 501(c)(3) non-denominational nonprofit organization and a member of the Evangelical Council for Financial Accountability (ECFA), that was established 85 years ago in Kansas City as a means for women in the community to connect. Since, then women’s groups across the United States have been formed, and a group of Yankton women are bringing Stonecroft to Yankton through Yankton Area Women’s Connection (YAWC). Follow Yankton Area Women’s Connection on Facebook. For additional information, call 402-254-2102 or 605-660-0378.

title: Letter: Contact 811 Before You Dig
creator: Steve Barnett 811 Board member, South Dakota Rural Electric Association General Manager Codi Gregg 811 Executive Director
content: Construction season is here and safety is the number one priority when it comes to digging, excavating, and locating utility lines. Just one strike of a gas line, electrical cable or a water pipeline can have catastrophic consequences for workers and residents. Digging without first checking for these lines can lead to service outages, costly repairs, fines, serious injuries or even fatalities. Under South Dakota law (SDCL 49-7A) contractors, excavators, operators — even weekend project do-it-yourselfers — are required to notify 811, either through a phone call or from the website, which is www.call811.com , prior to any digging project. The 811 system is free for anyone doing any digging and it is easy to use. After notifying the 811 system, utilities will send out locators within 48 hours (excluding weekends and holidays) to mark infrastructure around the site. By using the free 811 online portal, you can monitor the progress of the locates and safely begin your underground digging project. Remember, notifying 811 before you dig can prevent outages and accidents that impact you and your community — it may even save a life. In our roles as board member and Executive Director of the South Dakota 811 Board, we’ve seen firsthand how so many avoidable accidents could have been prevented simply by calling 811. Protecting underground utilities, people, equipment, and communities takes everyone, so please abide by the 811 laws. Enjoy your summer and be safe!

title: Sound Off for July 10, 2025
content: Where’s the humanity? Where’s the decency? Where’s the kindness? Our governor brags about incarcerated people being eaten by alligators. Of these people, 93 percent of the immigrants have no violent history. They’re kept in cages, very hot, sweltering accommodations with no air conditioning and flooding and tremendous humidity. What happened to America? What happened to the land of the free, the land of the kind? You’re not meant to be free. Where is America? Where is all this cruelty? What’s America? Let’s make America kind again. Instead of making it great, let’s make it kind. Where is the humanity? I see our county commissioners allowing 5,000 more homes. Boy, we’ve got to get rid of them commissioners. We’ve got to get rid of them. They’re no good for us at all. This growth in this county is ridiculous. You’re going to all run out of water, and then what are we going to do? Get rid of these county commissioners, and Steve Howard’s got to go. He’s way overpaid. He’s got to go. Inverness’s plans to tear up streets to add sewers in South Highlands is a detriment to our environment, including the diverse fauna resident in this neighborhood. Our Florida Department of Environmental Protection, FDEP, should know that South Highlands still has lots of natural habitats that the busier parts of Inverness have sadly lost. As an example, FDEP should know that the two proposed lift stations on Cabot Street are next to sites where a diminishing number of land tortoises have their...

title: ‘Jake Jaunt’ Kayaking Event Set For July 19
content: The third annual Jake Jaunt, a paddling event on the Missouri River for canoes, kayaks and other paddled craft, is set for July 19, 2025. It starts in Yankton. The event offers 25 miles of the longest river in the United States for participants of any skill level. Some paddle it fast, others casually and anyone who enjoys time on the water is welcome. The event includes guidance and support, fellowship with paddlers from six states and all who take part get T-shirts. Finishers get medals, and gold, silver and bronze awards go to the three fastest paddlers. Last year, more than 80 participants got underway at Riverside Park in Yankton at 9 a.m. Most were finished between noon and 2:30 p.m. Everyone finished and the last paddlers were done before 4 p.m. All who take part are welcome to join a catered meal with beverages at the Clay County Park boat ramp picnic shelter, which serves as the finish. The event is a memorial event for long-time Yankton native Jake Riter. Riter, who passed away in 2022, was an avid kayaker, boater and event organizer. He volunteered as a safety boat captain for past paddling events on the Missouri River, including the South Dakota Kayak Challenge and the Fort to Field 50 Paddle Battle. Riter helped hundreds of people achieve their adventures on the river in a safe way. This event lets people who love the river do what he loved to do – get out and paddle. About 60 paddlers are signed up for the 2025 event. Registration continues until the event...

Použije prezident Petr Pavel veto, nebo popře sám sebe?
‘Crazy Days’ Set For Friday, Saturday In Downtown Yankton
creator: By Jay Gravholt jay.gravholt@yankton.net
content: Are you crazy for shopping? This weekend marks the annual Crazy Days event downtown in Yankton’s Meridian District. Those who lived in Yankton during the 1970s and 1980s may recall a huge weekend event where stores would go all out with racks out on the streets with “crazy” prices. A lot of the participants dressed up for the occasion, as well. This retail ritual has been revived in Yankton for around a decade, according to Boston Shoes to Boots owner Mandi Gause. She said the Meridian District retailors collaborate throughout the year to come up with “event” shopping ideas in which many of the businesses participate. Recent promotional events that have proven quite successful, include the “Sip n’ Shop” and “Blossoms and Boutiques” events. “Crazy Days has been revived now for quite a while,” Gause said. “It’s not quite as ‘crazy’ as the olden days — I remember performing at that when I was young — but it is a staple event that we hold each July.” The timing of the sales and clearance items is quite intentional, according to Gause. “It’s a good time for us to move some inventory (in preparing for our fall inventory),” she said. “The best part about these events is just seeing the shoppers. Some of them we don’t see very often.” River City Relics, which opened in 2018 under the ownership of Drew Delvaux and Zeke Matthews, will be participating in Saturday’s event. Matthews spoke with the Press & Dakotan about Crazy Days and the evolution of the store. “We started out as a...

Do Just One Thing: July 10, 2025
content: In our ever-evolving digital age, you might wonder: Is it greener to stream a movie or to download it? It turns out downloading is the better choice. Streaming relies on energy-intensive servers and data centers, while downloading content reduces dependence on these systems, leading to lower emissions and energy usage. However, when comparing streaming to physical DVDs, streaming comes out ahead -- there’s no packaging, manufacturing or shipping involved, making it the more environmentally friendly option.

title: SD Lawmaker Files Statement Of Candidacy To Run For US House
creator: By Joshua Haiar © 2025, South Dakota Searchlight
content: A Republican state legislator from Madison filed his statement of candidacy Wednesday to run for South Dakota’s lone seat in the U.S. House of Representatives. Casey Crabtree is the second Republican to take a formal step toward running, after Attorney General Marty Jackley. Current Republican U.S. Rep. Dusty Johnson is running for governor next year. Crabtree, 42, who currently serves in the state Senate, submitted paperwork to the Federal Election Commission. He did not immediately respond to a request for comment, but did share his interest in a statement issued last week. “I’m thankful for Dusty’s work in Congress supporting South Dakota and Trump’s America First agenda,” he said at the time. “South Dakota has had giants like John Thune, Kristi Noem, and Dusty Johnson represent us in the U.S. House, and those are big shoes to fill. My family and I have received a lot of encouragement across the state to consider a bid for this open seat. I am strongly considering this opportunity and we will look at this as a family through prayer and serious conversations.” Jackley announced his campaign last month, the same day Johnson publicly scheduled his announcement for governor. Jackley has since filed with the Federal Election Commission. Crabtree works as an economic development director for Heartland Energy in Madison, and served as state Senate majority leader during the 2023 and 2024 legislative sessions. The Republican primary election is in June 2026, with the statewide...

title: Los satélites de España, vanguardia de la defensa espacial europea: "Están listos para la guerra"
content: La invasión rusa de Ucrania en febrero de 2022 marcó un punto de inflexión en la forma de entender y hacer la guerra en Europa. En cuestión de horas, el conflicto obligó a repensar doctrinas militares, capacidades estratégicas y la arquitectura de seguridad en todo el continente. La propia Alianza Atlántica, —a la que el presidente francés, Emmanuel Macron, sentenció de estar en estado "de muerte cerebral"— resucitó en apenas horas para hacer frente a la amenaza rusa y con ello se activaron nuevos planes de defensa a gran escala que incluían un aumento significativo del gasto militar de todos sus Estados miembros.La repercusión de lo que sigue suponiendo la invasión en Ucrania ha influido directamente en la industria de Defensa y en las capacidades militares de cada aliado. En el caso español, los ejemplos abundan y uno de los más sonados a nivel internacional tiene que ver con el desarrollo de los satélites espaciales SpainSat NG I y SpainSat NG II, de la compañía Hisdesat, que prometen formar parte de uno de los sistemas de comunicaciones militares más avanzados en Europa. Sus áreas de cobertura abarcarán una extensa red geográfica desde Estados Unidos y Sudamérica hasta Oriente Medio —incluyendo también África y Europa— y llegando hasta Singapur, en Asia.Está previsto que el SpainSat NG II se sume el próximo mes de octubre (entre los días 22 y 29) a su satélite gemelo, que ya está en órbita desde el pasado mes de enero. Tras completar sus...

Welcome to your job interview. Your interviewer is AI.
content: SAN FRANCISCO: When Jennifer Dunn, 54, landed an interview last month through a recruiting firm for a vice president of marketing job, she looked forward to talking to someone about the role and learning more about the potential employer. Instead, a virtual artificial intelligence recruiter named Alex sent her a text message to schedule the interview. And when Dunn got on the phone at the appointed time for the meeting, Alex was waiting to talk to her. “Are you a human?” Dunn asked. “No, I’m not a human,” Alex replied. “But I’m here to make the interview process smoother.” For the next 20 minutes, Dunn, a marketing professional in San Antonio, answered Alex’s questions about her qualifications – though Alex could not answer most of her questions about the job. Even though Alex had a friendly tone, the conversation “felt hollow,” Dunn said. In the end, she hung up before finishing the interview. You might have thought AI was coming for your job. First it’s coming for your job interviewer. Job seekers across the country are starting to encounter faceless voices and avatars backed by AI in their interviews. These autonomous interviewers are part of a wave of artificial intelligence known as “agentic AI,” where AI agents are directed to act on their own to generate real-time conversations and build on responses. Some aspects of job searches – such as screening resumes and scheduling meetings – have become increasingly automated over time, but the interview had long seemed to be...

Cattlemen’s Association To Host Region Roundup In Mitchell On July 16
content: The South Dakota Cattlemen’s Association (SDCA) will host the Mitchell Region Roundup on July 16 at Palace City Brewery in Mitchell. The Region Roundup is open to both the public and SDCA members. The Mitchell Region Roundup will begin with a social starting at 5:30 p.m., followed by a meal and programming. The SDCA’s Southeast Region Directors, Austin Havlik and Colby Olson, along with SDCA’s Vice President of Membership, Calli Williams, welcome Scott Varilek with Kooima Kooima Varilek Trading, who has provided risk management to agricultural producers for over forty years. The Mitchell Region Roundup will be followed by live music by Karter Kenis. The 2025 Region Roundup events are scheduled to take place across the state. The SDCA invites you to attend a Roundup at a location near you: • Pierre — July 22: 5:30 p.m. at Cattlemen’s Club Steakhouse • Winner — July 23: 5:30 p.m. at Winner Livestock Auction • Wall — July 24: 5:30 p.m. at Red Rock Restaurant • Gettysburg — Aug. 5: 5:30 p.m. at Bob’s Steakhouse • Spearfish — Sept. 14: 5:30 p.m. MST at Killian’s Food & Drink For more information regarding the 2025 Region Roundup events, visit sdcattlemen.org . The SDCA encourages those interested to RSVP to the event, however, it is not required. To RSVP visit sdcattlemen.org , click on the events tab, and select an event location near you.

title: Produk Impor Masih Dominasi Pasar, Pelaku Industri Lokal Lakukan Penguatan Inovasi
content: Beberapa tahun terakhir, industri elektrik (e-cigarette) di Indonesia menunjukkan perkembangan yang signifikan, khususnya dari sisi produksi dalam negeri. Meski produk masih mendominasi pasar, kehadiran produsen lokal turut mampu bersaing menjadi tanda positif bagi tumbuhnya kemandirian industri nasional. Selain memberikan kontribusi terhadap perluasan lapangan kerja dan mendorong pengembangan teknologi, kehadiran pelaku industri lokal juga membawa dampak positif dalam hal penyesuaian produk dengan regulasi yang berlaku. Di tengah ekosistem yang terus berkembang, pendekatan berbasis konsumen, edukasi yang berkelanjutan, serta dialog yang dekat dengan pengguna produk menjadi kunci dalam menciptakan inovasi yang relevan. Salah satu pelaku industri yang konsisten menerapkan pendekatan terhadap konsumen dan pemahaman pasar adalah PT Delta Sukses Teknologi. Dalam kurun waktu kurang dari satu tahun, perusahaan memperluas jangkauan operasionalnya ke lebih dari 35 kota di Indonesia, mulai dari Jakarta, Makassar, hingga Denpasar melalui jaringan vape store, gerai resmi, dan gerai modern yang tersebar di berbagai wilayah. Adapun komitmen untuk membangun ekosistem yang bertanggung jawab, perseroan turut ikut serta dalam ajang VAPEFEST 2025 yang berlangsung pada 5–6 Juli 2025 di Bandung. Harold Hutabarat, Commercial Director PT Delta Sukses Teknologi, menyatakan bahwa keikutsertaan dalam ajang ini memiliki arti penting bagi perusahaan. “Acara ini merupakan salah satu pameran tahunan...

title: 20 Ribu Orang Akan Padati Solo pada 19–20 Juli 2025, Kongres PSI Siapkan Dua Lokasi
content: Partai Solidaritas Indonesia (PSI) akan punya gawe besar di Solo. Mereka akan menggelar Kongres untuk memilik ketua umum baru. Diperkirakan ada 20 ribu orang yang akan hadir. "Sesuai jumlah kemarin kami rapat terakhir, kurang lebih kurang lebih ya sekitar 20.000 orang yang akan apa turut hadir saja di Solo," ujar Ketua Dewan Pimpinan Wilayah (DPW) PSI Jateng, Antonius Yogo Prabowo saat ditemui di Desa Mlese, Kecamatan Cawas, Kabupaten Klaten, Rabu (9/7/2025). Kongres PSI sendiri, dijadwalkan berlangsung selama dua hari pada 19-20 Juli 2025. "Dan ini terbagi di dua tempat, hari Sabtu dan Minggu. Yang Minggu memang nanti karena kapasitas gedung lebih besar, tentu jumlah itu akan hadir nanti," jelasnya. Dua lokasi yang disiapkan, yakni Gedung Graha Saba di Kecamatan Sumber, dan Edutorium Ahmad Dahlan UMS di Kecamatan Laweyan. Kongres PSI sendiri, akan menentukan ketua umum PSI periode 2025-2030. Terdapat tiga kandidat calon yang bakal dipilih, yang mengajukan diri. Mereka adalah Ronald Aristone Sinaga atau BroRon, Kaesang Pangarep, dan Agus Mulyono Herlambang. (*)

title: Sport (2) 0 x 0 (4) Ceará – Vozão despacha Leão na Copa do Nordeste
creator: Mateus Schuler
content: Recife, PE, 09 (AFI) – O Ceará se vingou da última temporada e despachou o Sport da Copa do Nordeste. Nesta quarta-feira, o Vozão levou o melhor ante o Leão, após disputa por pênaltis, por 4 a 2, pois ficaram empatados sem gols durante o tempo normal pelas quartas de final do Nordestão.Com a classificação assegurada às semifinais, o Alvinegro de Porangabuçu agora encara o Bahia, na Arena Fonte Nova, em data e horário a serem definidos pela CBF. Os times voltam a campo, pelo Brasileiro, nos próximos dias: os cearenses farão Clássico-Rei contra o Fortaleza neste domingo (13), às 20h30, enquanto os pernambucanos visitam o Juventude, no domingo (14), às 20h; jogos válidos pela 13a rodada da Série A.LEÃO DOMINA SEM SUCESSOA partida começou pegando fogo, com Sport e Ceará se estudando, mas buscando não errar no início. E um erro alvinegro quase ocasionou no primeiro gol rubro-negro: Barletta explorou saída errada e saiu em velocidade pelo lado esquerdo, servindo Paciência, que chutou e a marcação desviou pela linha de fundo. O Leão voltou a assustar quando Barletta pegou sobra da entrada da área, dominou e soltou o pé, porém Bruno Ferreira tirou para escanteio.O domínio dos rubro-negros prosseguiu durante maior parte da primeira etapa, enquanto o Vozão ficou procurando alternativas para resistir à pressão. Numa escapada, Igor Cariús recebeu pela esquerda e deu bom passe para Zé Lucas, que fez o domínio, driblou o marcador e bateu colocado; a...

title: Harga Terbaru Offroad Jeep Latar Semeru 2025, Surga Bagi Pencinta Petualangan
content: Ingin merasakan sensasi petualangan ekstrem di tengah keindahan alam pegunungan? Offroad Latar Semeru bisa jadi pilihan sempurna untuk kamu yang menyukai tantangan. Terletak di kawasan strategis kaki , wisata ini menawarkan pengalaman menegangkan menyusuri jalur bebatuan, lumpur, hingga medan terjal yang menguji adrenalin. Kamu yang berencana offroad di sana dalam waktu dekat, bisa nih menyimak dulu rincian informasi tarif dan layanannya ini. Banyak wisatawan lokal hingga mancanegara mulai menjadikan trip offroad Latar Semeru sebagai agenda wajib saat liburan ke Jawa Timur. Selain menikmati panorama alam yang spektakuler, kamu juga akan diajak menjelajahi spot-spot tersembunyi yang belum banyak diketahui. Tak heran jika wisata ini dijuluki “surga” bagi pencinta petualangan sejati. Pelopor Trip Latar Semeru, Mas Wit menjelaskan rute wisata petualangan ini menawarkan pengalaman off-road dengan menggunakan mobil Suzuki Katana. Tour kawasan lereng di kawasan Dusun Kajarkuning, Desa Sumberwuluh, Kecamatan Candipur itu bisa dipesan dengan harga Rp 350 ribu. Rute yang dilewatj adalah menawarkan pemandangan kaki Gunung Semeru, dengan latar puncak Mahameru yang ikonik. "Cukup dengan Rp 350 ribu per unit jeep dari Kalipinusan Poncosumo. Itu sudah termasuk paket lengkap perjalanan dengan pengemudi berpengalaman," Beber Wit dikutip pada Selasa (8/7/2025). Wit menambahkan tur off road dimulai dari titik Kalipinusan Poncosumo menuju Dusun Kajarkuning, melintasi medan khas erupsi...

title: 윤석열 서울구치소 수감...에어컨 없는 3평 독방으로
content: 기사를 읽어드립니다 Your browser does not support the audio element. 0 윤석열 전 대통령이 9일 서울 서초구 서울중앙지법에서 열린 구속 전 피의자 심문(영장실질심사)이 끝난 뒤 법무부 호송차에 오르고 있다. 사진공동취재단 내란 사건을 수사하는 조은석 특별검사팀이 청구한 구속영장이 법원에서 발부되면서 윤석열 전 대통령이 다시 서울구치소에 수감됐다. 지난 3월8일 법원의 구속취소로 석방된 지 124일 만이다. 남세진 서울중앙지법 영장전담 부장판사는 10일 새벽 2시15분께 “증거 인멸의 염려”가 있다며 윤 전 대통령의 구속영장을 발부했다. 전날 오후 남 부장판사가 심리하는 영장심사 뒤 경기 의왕 서울구치소로 이동해 대기하던 윤 전 대통령은 바로 일반사동에 수용될 것으로 보인다. 윤 전 대통령은 일반 수용자와 똑같은 입소 절차를 밟는다. 사복을 수의로 갈아입고 수용기록부에 올라갈 이른바 ‘머그샷’(얼굴 사진)을 촬영한다. 이어 신체검사와 소지품 영치 절차를 밟은 뒤 독방에 수감될 것으로 보인다. 독방의 크기는 약 3평(약 10m2) 남짓으로 알려졌다. 독방은 침대가 없는 온돌 형식이며 텔레비전이 비치되어 있다. 윤 전 대통령이 수감될 서울구치소 일반사동에는 에어컨이 설치되어 있지 않는 것으로 알려졌다. 광고 식사도 일반 수용자와 같은 메뉴가 제공된다. 목욕은 공동 목욕탕에서 하게 되지만, 교정당국에서 다른 수용자와 겹치지 않게 동선 등을 조정할 것으로 보인다. 구속영장 발부로 윤...

Update Korban Tewas Tenggelamnya KMP Tunu Pratama Jaya: 13 Orang
content: Jakarta Nelayan di Jembrana, Bali, kembali menemukan satu jenazah diduga korban ke-13 tenggelamnya KMP Tunu Pratama Jaya. Jenazah berjenis kelamin laki-laki itu ditemukan mengambang di perairan Pebuahan, Desa Banyubiru, Kecamatan Negara. Nelayan menemukan jenazah ini pada Kamis (10/7/2025) pagi ini. Hal ini dibenarkan oleh Kepala Pelaksana BPBD Jembrana, I Putu Agus Artana Putra. "Benar ada satu jenazah yang ditemukan nelayan Pebuahan pagi tadi," katanya dilansir detikBali , Kamis (10/7). SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT Baca juga: Jenazah Berkemeja Kotak Merah Ditemukan di Jembrana, Diduga Korban KMP Tunu ADVERTISEMENT Agus Artana mengatakan jenazah pertama kali ditemukan sekitar pukul 03.00 Wita oleh Moh Fajri (60), nelayan Banjar Pebuahan. Saat itu, ia sedang melaut menggunakan perahu miliknya 'Guna Asih'. Dengan penemuan ini, maka korban tewas menjadi 13 orang. Saat berada di tengah laut, Fajri melihat sesosok tubuh mengambang. Fajri kemudian mengevakuasi jenazah tersebut ke pesisir pantai Dusun Pebuahan. Evakuasi jenazah dilakukan sekitar pukul 08.50 Wita oleh tim SAR gabungan. Jenazah kemudian dibawa ke RSU Negara untuk proses identifikasi lebih lanjut. Baca berita selengkapnya di sini. title: Patroli Dini Hari, Tim Patroli Enggang Polresta Pontianak Amankan Bocah Bawa Sajam di Jalan Merdeka
content: Saat melintas di Jalan Merdeka, personel Tim Enggang mendapati sekelompok anak remaja yang masih berkumpul di pinggir jalan pada waktu yang tidak wajar. Melihat situasi tersebut, tim patroli kemudian melakukan pemeriksaan dan pembinaan di lokasi. Dari hasil pemeriksaan, salah satu dari remaja tersebut kedapatan membawa (sajam). Tanpa perlawanan, pelaku beserta barang bukti langsung diamankan untuk mencegah hal-hal yang tidak diinginkan. Kapolresta Pontianak Kombes Pol. , SIK, MH, melalui Kasat Samapta AKP Samidi membenarkan kejadian tersebut dan menyampaikan bahwa pelaku yang masih di bawah umur telah diamankan ke Polsek Pontianak Kota untuk proses lebih lanjut. “Tindakan tegas namun terukur dilakukan untuk menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban masyarakat, apalagi ini melibatkan anak di bawah umur yang kedapatan membawa sajam di tempat umum pada jam rawan,”ujarnya. Pihak kepolisian juga mengimbau kepada orang tua agar meningkatkan pengawasan terhadap anak-anaknya, terutama pada malam hingga dini hari, guna mencegah mereka terlibat dalam aktivitas yang dapat membahayakan diri sendiri maupun orang lain. Patroli Enggang akan terus digelar secara berkala guna menciptakan rasa aman dan mencegah potensi tindak kriminal di wilayah Kota Pontianak.

title: ‘แสง-ไซ้กี เหตระกูล-ศิริราช’ เดินหน้า60 ชีวิต 60 ก้าวใหม่ ผ่าตัดเปลี่ยนข้อเข่าเทียม รพ.ระนอง
creator: Phanit Nilnakorn
content: เมื่อวันที่ 10 ก.ค. ที่ รพ.ระนอง นางประพิณ รุจิรวงศ์ กรรมการบริหารเดลินิวส์ นายนนท์ รุจิรวงศ์ ผู้อํานวยการฝ่ายขายและจัดจําหน่ายฯ ร่วมกิจกรรมในโครงการ “เดลินิวส์-ศิริราช 60 ชีวิต 60 ก้าวใหม่” ที่ทาง เดลินิวส์ โดยมูลนิธิแสง-ไซ้กี เหตระกูล และภาควิชาศัลยศาสตร์ออร์โธปิดิคส์และกายภาพบําบัด คณะแพทยศาสตร์ศิริราชพยาบาล มหาวิทยาลัยมหิดล นําโดย ศ.นพ.กีรติ เจริญชลวานิช หัวหน้าภาควิชาศัลยศาสตร์ออร์โธปิดิคส์และกายภาพบําบัด และในฐานะประธานราชวิทยาลัยแพทย์ออร์โธปิดิกส์แห่งประเทศไทย จัดขึ้น ทั้งนี้ร่วมกันจัดกิจกรรมเพื่อช่วยเหลือผู้ป่วยข้อเข่าเสื่อมขาดแคลนทุนทรัพย์ในการผ่าตัดและอยู่ห่างไกลในพื้นที่ถิ่นทุรกันดาร “โครงการ ‘60 ชีวิต 60 ก้าวใหม่’ เดลินิวส์-ศิริราช เกิดขึ้นจากความตั้งใจของมูลนิธิแสง-ไซ้กี เหตระกูล และภาควิชาออร์โธปิดิคส์ฯ คณะแพทยศาสตร์ศิริราชพยาบาล ในวาระครบรอบ 60 ปี ที่เล็งเห็นว่าภาวะข้อเสื่อมเป็นหนึ่งในสาเหตุสําคัญที่ทําให้ผู้สูงอายุของไทยเกิดภาวะทุพพลภาพ คนไทยมีปัญหาข้อเข่าเยอะมาก การผ่าตัดแต่ละครั้งใช้เวลานานในการรอคิว จึงตั้งใจเริ่มต้นใหม่อีกครั้ง โดยได้ร่วมมือกับ ศ.นพ.กีรติ เจริญชลวานิช หัวหน้าภาควิชาออร์โธปิดิคส์ฯ คณะแพทยศาสตร์ศิริราชพยาบาล จึงเกิดเป็นโครงการผ่าตัดข้อเข่าเทียม เพื่อหวังจะมอบ ‘ก้าวใหม่’ ให้กับ 60 ชีวิต และส่งต่อพลังใจไปยังครอบครัวและสังคมต่อไป.

title: Vivo V60 spotted on SIRIM and TUV certification websites, tipped to launch soon
creator: Moneycontrol
content: Vivo V60 has now been certified by multiple regulatory platforms, hinting at its imminent launch. It is expected to arrive as a successor to the Vivo V50 and might have support for 90W fast charging.

title: Former Jazz coach and GM Layden dies at 93
creator: The Associated Press
content: SALT LAKE CITY — Frank Layden, the sharp-witted former coach who led the Utah Jazz to the playoffs for the first time, has died. He was 93. “Frank Layden made a lasting impact on the Jazz, the state of Utah, and the NBA,” the Jazz said in a statement Wednesday. “There will never be another like him. Our thoughts go out to his family as we join in mourning his loss and celebrating his life. Rest easy, Coach.” Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: 3Kali Bitung-Fakfak, Jadwal Kapal Pelni KM Sangiang Besok-13 Agustus 2025, Diskon Tiket Juli 2025
Menpar Buka Konferensi Internasional Destinasi Geowisata Kaldera Toba Unesco Global Geopark 2025
content: Kegiatan tersebut berlangsung di Hotel Khas Parapat, Danau Toba, Kabupaten Simalungun, Selasa (8/7/2025). "Forum ini sangat penting untuk ruang dimana ide tumbuh menjadi aksi. Status Geopark bukan hanya sebagai bentuk perlindungan tetapi juga sebagai peluang untuk membuka ruang pembelajaran serta pengembangan pariwisata yang berkelanjutan," ujar Menpar Widiyanti Putri saat menyampaikan kata sambutan. Ia menambahan, pengelolaan pariwisata tidak bisa hanya mengandalkan infrastruktur. Namun diperlukan harmoni dengan pengetahuan diperkaya oleh narasi dan digerakkan oleh inovasi. Lewat seminar ini, ia berharap langsung forum-forum berikutnya hingga menjadi pusat ilmu pengetahuan. Karena itu, untuk mewujudkan visi besar ini, tidak cukup dengan kekaguman semata, tetapi harus dikelola dengan kesadaran dan arah yang jelas. "UNESCO telah memberikan panduan melalui tiga pilar utama geopark global. Yaitu perlindungan, edukasi dan pengembangan berkelanjutan. Melalui geowisata, kita dapat mendorong inovasi lokal, menciptakan lapangan kerja dan membuka peluang ekonomi baru tanpa mengorbankan nilai alam maupun budaya," ujar Menpar, sekaligus membuka secara resmi kegiatan The 1st International Conference, Geotourism Destination Toba Caldera Unesco Global Geopark 2025. Sedangkan, Gubernur Bobby Afif Nasution mengajak seluruh kepala daerah, khususnya tujuh kabupaten di kawasan Danau Toba, untuk bersama menguatkan semangat dan tekad guna menjaga kelestarian alam di kawasan Danau Toba. "Saya...

title: 尹구속에 엇갈린 반응..."법정 최고형" "안타까운 일"
creator: 정주희
content: [앵커] 윤석열 전 대통령의 재구속에 여야의 반응도 엇갈렸습니다. 더불어 민주당은 구속 직후 "상식적 결정'이라는 입장문을 냈고, 국민의힘은 국민께 송구하다는 짧은 입장을 밝혔습니다. 국회 취재기자 연결해 자세히 들어보겠습니다. 정주희 기자! [기자] 네, 민주당은 윤 전 대통령 구속 직후 박상혁 수석대변인 명의로 입장문을 내고 "정의를 바로 세우기 위한 상식적인 결정"이라고 밝혔습니다. 오늘 오전 정책조정회의에서도 김병기 원내대표는 "사필귀정, 철저한 수사와 단죄의 시간"이라며 "민주당은 내란의 완전 종식을 위해서 마지막까지 긴장을 늦추지 않겠다"고 말했습니다. 직접 들어보시겠습니다. "우리 국민은 너무 오래 기다리고 있습니다. 하루 빨리 내란수괴 윤석열과 그 일당들에게 법정 최고형을 내려서" 반면, 국민의힘은 윤석열 전 대통령 구속에 공식적인 입장을 내지는 않았지만, 송언석 비상대책위원장이 오늘 오전 비대위 회의를 마친 뒤 전직 대통령이 또다시 구속됐다며 국민께 송구하다는 입장을 밝혔습니다. 직접 들어보시겠습니다. "국민 여러분께는 굉장히 송구하게 생각합니다. 매우 안타까운 일이 벌어졌습니다. 다만 수사와 재판은 법과 원칙에 따라서 정당하게 공정하게..." 동시에 국민의힘은 소속 인사들에 대한 특검 수사 본격화에 견제구도 날렸습니다. 특히 특검이 윤상현 의원의 사무실과 자택을 압수수색하고 원희룡 전 국토교통부 장관에 대해 출국금지 조치를 한 것을...

title: Dukung Swasembada Pangan, Polres Jepara Gelar Penanaman Jagung Serentak Kuartal III
content: Komitmen mendukung swasembada pangan nasional terus digelorakan. Kepolisian Resor (Polres) Jepara, Polda Jawa Tengah, bersama instansi terkait dan masyarakat menggelar kegiatan Kuartal III di lahan perhutanan Desa Kancilan, Kecamatan Kembang, Kabupaten Jepara, pada Rabu (9/7/2025). Kegiatan ini merupakan bagian dari program nasional Polri dan Kementerian Pertanian RI dalam upaya memperkuat ketahanan pangan. Penanaman jagung dilakukan serentak di berbagai daerah Indonesia dan dipantau langsung oleh Kapolri Jenderal Listyo Sigit Prabowo melalui Zoom yang diselenggarakan oleh Mabes Polri di Kabupaten Grobogan, Jawa Tengah. Di Kabupaten Jepara sendiri, acara dipimpin Kapolres Jepara AKBP Erick Budi Santoso yang diwakili oleh Wakapolres Jepara Kompol Edy Sutrisno dengan dihadiri oleh Staf Ahli Bidang Pemerintahan, Hukum dan Politik Setda Jepara Muh. Tahsin beserta jajaran Forkopimda, pejabat utama dan personel , Forkopimcam Kembang, Petinggi se-kecamatan Kembang, perwakilan kelompok tani, masyarakat setempat serta tamu undangan lainnya. Dalam sambutannya, Wakapolres Jepara Kompol Edy Sutrisno mengatakan, bahwa Polres Jepara siap mendukung ketahanan pangan yang menjadi program pemerintah. “Dengan penanaman jagung serentak Kuartal III tahun 2025 ini, kami siap mendukung ketahanan pangan yang diprogramkan pemerintah," ujarnya. Kompol Edy menjelaskan, program ketahanan pangan ini adalah upaya pemerintah dan berbagai pihak untuk memastikan ketersediaan, keterjangkauan, dan keamanan...

title: Hasil Klasemen VNL 2025 Putri Terbaru, Momentum Kemenangan Thailand Ambyar di Tangan Amerika Serikat
content: - Hasil klasemen VNL 2025 putri hari ini ditutup oleh kekalahan yang dialami , Kamis (10/7/2025) siang WIB. Thailand yang tergabung dalam Pool 8 harus mengakui keunggulan . Bermain di College Park Center, Arlington, , Thailand sejatinya mempunyai momentum untuk meraih kemenangan seusai mampu menyamakan kedudukan 1-1. Sayang, gagal konsisten hingga akhirnya kalah dari dengan skor 1-3 (26-28, 25-21, 25-27, 15-25). Dengan kekalahan tersebut, masih berada di zona degradasi. Thailand yang menjadi satu-satunya tim ASEAN kini bertengger di posisi 17 dengan hanya mengemas lima poin dan berada di atas Korea Selatan yang menempati juru kunci dengan empat poin. Sementara itu, puncak klasemen masih ditempati Italia dengan 25 poin. Lalu di urutan kedua, ada Polandia yang mengemas 24 poin. Disusul Brasil di urutan ketiga dengan 23 poin. Italia, Polandia, dan Brasil, menjadi tim yang telah dipastikan lolos ke delapan besar VNL 2025 putri. vs Kanada 3-2 (24-26, 25-20, 23-25, 25-23, 15-13) Belanda vs 0-3 (19-25, 16-25, 21-25) Republik Dominika vs 2-3 (22-25, 25-17, 25-22, 22-25, 13-15)

title: Joe Coleman, No. 3 pick in the first MLB draft who pitched for Senators and Tigers, dies at 78
Joe Coleman, No. 3 pick in the first MLB draft who pitched for Senators and Tigers, dies at 78
content: Joe Coleman, a lanky right-hander who won 142 games in 15 major league seasons and was an All-Star in 1972 with Detroit, died Wednesday morning, his son said. He was 78. Casey Coleman said his father died in his sleep in Jamestown, Tennessee. The son and father of major leaguers, Coleman became the No. 3 pick in baseball's inaugural amateur draft in 1965 when he was selected by the Washington Senators. His father, also named Joe — who pitched in the majors from 1942-55 — negotiated a club-record $75,000 signing bonus. The 6-foot-3, 175-pound Coleman became the first player to reach the majors after being drafted when he debuted for the Senators on Sept. 28, 1965. He threw a four-hitter to beat the Kansas City Athletics 6-1. After the 1970 season, Coleman was traded to Detroit in a deal that sent Denny McLain to Washington. He enjoyed his greatest individual success with the Tigers, going 88-73 with a 3.82 ERA from 1971-76. In 1971, he went 20-9 with a 3.15 ERA after recovering from a skull fracture that hospitalized him for two weeks. He was an All-Star the following season and made his only postseason appearance, striking out a then-playoff-record 14 batters to shut out the Oakland Athletics in Game 3 of the five-game American League championship series. The Tigers lost the series 3-2 and Oakland went on to beat Cincinnati in the World Series. Coleman's strikeout record stood for 25 years. Baltimore's Mike Mussina fanned 15 in the 1997 ALCS against Cleveland. Coleman also...

title: Akui Malu, Kelakuan Celine Evangelista di Malam Hari Terekam, Kagok Tepergok Makan Mie Pakai Nasi
content: BANJARMASINPOST.CO.ID - Ada saja kelakuan aktris Celine Evangelista makan mie pakai nasi pada malam hari menuai sorotan publik. Hal tersebut diketahui imbas janda aktor Stefan William itu makan sambil live di media sosial pribadinya. Celine Evangelista merasa malu efek malam-malam makan mie dengan nasi. Maklum saja, dirinya seorang artis terkenal dengan bayaran yang cukup tinggi. Namun, setelah berhijrah ia tampak berubah menjadi sosok publik figur yang apa adanya. Bahkan ia juga makan mie pakai nasi di malam hari yang bisa memicu berat badan naik. Baca juga: Mau Dilaporkan Ahmad Dhani, Lita Gading Posting Video Bareng El Rumi dan Dul Jaelani: Kok Bapaknya? Baca juga: Kembalinya Arya Saloka dan Amanda Manopo dalam 1 Project Disuarakan Fans, Efek Garap Series Lagi Padahal, belakangan ini Celine Evangelista sedang sibuk bolak-balik konsultasi berat badan dengan dokter Arif Kurniawan. “Bunda Celine malu2 makan mie malam2 pake nasi, “ terang dalam caption dilansir Banjarmasinpost.co.id melalui postingan TikTok @mr.arifinshi pada Kamis (10/7/2025). Tampak, gestur tubuh Celine memperlihatkan sikap malu-malu saat hendak menyantap makanan tersebut. Ia sampai menyuruh netizen untuk pura-pura tidak melihat apa yang dilakukannya saat itu. “Malu loh guys Ya udah ah pura-pura nggak lihat aja ya Malu loh aku makan mie jam segini pakai nasi lagi, “ ucap Celine Evangelista sambil memegang alat makan. Awalnya dia tetap merasa malu saat mengambil mie dari mangkuk.

title: Assassinato do jornalista Léo Veras na fronteira de MS é denunciado por organização internacional
creator: Anna Gomes
content: O assassinato do jornalista Léo Veras, de 52 anos, continua sem resposta. Cinco anos se passaram desde que ele foi executado a tiros em sua casa, na cidade paraguaia de Pedro Juan Caballero, na fronteira com Ponta Porã . Os assassinos o surpreenderam enquanto ele jantava com a família. A execução ocorreu na noite de 12 de fevereiro, de 2020. Pouco depois das 20h, dois homens invadiram a casa de Veras. O barulho do destrave da pistola Glock 9mm chamou a atenção do jornalista, que correu para o quintal. Os pistoleiros o seguiram e atiraram doze vezes. Léo era um dos poucos jornalistas locais que ousava publicar informações sobre o crime organizado e a rede de narcotráfico que liga o Brasil ao Paraguai. Ele fundou o próprio veículo, que abastecia geralmente com notícias curtas sobre acontecimentos da região. O crime era, e ainda é, o principal assunto, já que nas últimas décadas Pedro Juan se tornou um lugar particularmente violento. Outros seis jornalistas foram mortos na cidade desde 1991. O assassinato de Veras, contudo, se tornou um caso exemplar não apenas da violência na fronteira, mas sobretudo da impunidade. Cintia González, a viúva do jornalista, vem pleiteando há mais de cinco anos que a morte de seu marido seja investigada, mas até hoje não obteve respostas satisfatórias. Só uma pessoa foi presa por suspeita de participação no crime, mas acabou solta por falta de provas. A organização internacional mostra que o assassinato de Veras tem...

title: 한은, 기준금리 2.5% 동결..."집값·가계부채 고려"
creator: 윤형섭
content: [앵커] 한국은행이 오늘(10일) 기준금리를 기존 연 2.50%로 동결했습니다. 한국경제 저성장에도 불구하고 폭증하는 가계부채 부담을 고려한 결정입니다. 자세한 내용 취재기자 연결해 들어보겠습니다. 윤형섭 기자! [기자] 네, 한국은행 금융통화위원회는 오늘(10일) 기준금리를 연 2.50%로 유지했습니다. 당분간 낮은 성장세를 이어갈 것으로 예상하면서도 수도권 중심으로 급등하는 집값과 빠르게 늘어나는 가계대출을 고려했습니다. 금융위에 따르면 지난달 전 금융권 가계대출 증가액은 6조5천억원으로 증가 폭이 확대됐고, 은행권으로 좁혀봐도 가계대출은 6조2천억원 불어 전월에 비해 증가폭이 1조원이나 늘었습니다. 이 중 주택담보대출이 5조1천억원이나 늘었는데 수도권 집값 상승 기대감이 커진 데다, 스트레스 총부채원리금상환비율 DSR 3단계 시행을 앞두고 '막차 수요'까지 몰린 탓입니다. 서울 아파트 매매가격은 계속 상승세를 보인 데다, 올 2월부터 주택거래량 증가도 이어지며, 시차를 두고 반영되는 가계대출이 8월까지는 계속 늘어날 수 있을 것으로 한은은 전망했습니다. 다만, 정부의 6.27 가계부채 대책 후 다소 진정되는 움직임을 보이고 있어 한은은 그 영향을 지켜본다고 밝혔습니다. 한 차례 숨 고르기에 들어간 이번 금리 동결로, 한미간 금리차는 2%p를 유지했습니다. 다만, 경기 둔화에 대한 우려는 여전합니다. 정치 불확실성 해소로 소비 등이 개선되며 성장 부진은 다소 완화했지만, 건설투자 감소세는...

Kasatpol PP Tegas Tak Ada Kompensasi untuk Pemilik Bangli di Bantaran Sungai Kp. Pulo Timaha Bekasi
content: --- Pemerintah Kabupaten Bekasi tidak akan memberikan kompensasi bagi pemilik bangunan liar di sempadan jalan dan bantaran Sungai Kampung Pulo Timaha, Kecamatan Babelan, Kabupaten Bekasi, yang dibongkar aparat Satpol PP pada Rabu (9/7/2025). Kepala Satpol PP Kabupaten Bekasi Surya Wijaya memastikan, tidak ada kompensasi bagi pemilik bangunan liar yang dibongkar. Alasannya, para pemilik bangunan liar terbukti melanggar karena menempati tanah negara sehingga tidak ada kompensasi. "Karena memang secara aturan mereka sudah melanggar garis sepadan sungai dan garis sepadan jalan," tegas dia. Setelah pembongkaran selesai, bantaran sungai yang menjadi lokasi bekas bangunan liar akan dilakukan normalisasi dan revitalisasi tanggul. Normalisasi dilakukan guna mengantisipasi banjir yang disebabkan karena penyempitan sungai. "Akan diadakan normalisasi, revitalisasi tanggul. Karena memang Kabupaten Bekasi ini rawan bencana banjir, jadi memang kali dan sungai harus tertib," imbuh dia. Alfian (55), warga yang terimbas pembongkaran bangunan liar mengaku kecewa terhadap Gubernur Jawa Barat Dedi Mulyadi. Ia berharap tak akan ada lagi kebijakan yang menyengsarakan masyarakat kecil seandainya kelak Dedi Mulyadi dipercaya menjadi Presiden. "Nanti kalau jadi Presiden jangan lebih parah, bukan kita pembenci, tapi kami berharap terbuka. Jangan mengulangi lagi, kalau bisa dibantu datang saja Pak," ujar Alfian. Sebelum eksekusi dilakukan, Alfian telah berupaya menyampaikan aspirasinya lewat media...

title: Former Wildcats Nowell, Johnson to play in NBA Summer League
content: A pair of former Kansas State men’s basketball players – Keyontae Johnson and Markquis Nowell – will join recent alum Coleman Hawkins at the upcoming NBA 2K26 Summer League that starts Thursday (July 10) and runs until Sunday, July 20 at the Thomas & Mack Center and Pavilion in Las Vegas. NBA teams will play round-robin games for a week starting Thursday until July 17 before the playoffs run from July 18-19 capped by the championship game on July 20. Johnson will play for the Denver Nuggets after playing for the Charlotte Hornets’ G-League team – the Greensboro Swarm, where he averaged 17.7 points, 4.7 rebounds and 2.7 assists in 34 games in 2024-25. Nowell will play for the Milwaukee Bucks after playing for the Houston Rockets’ G-League team – the Rio Grande Valley Vipers, where he averaged 17.3 points, 8.1 assists and 3.1 rebounds in 33 games last season. Hawkins recently signed a summer league contract with the Golden State Warriors and began his pro career at the California Classic, averaging 8.0 points on 60 percent shooting with 4.0 rebounds and 2.5 assists per game in 2 games, July 5, 6 and 8 at the Chase Center in San Francisco. Johnson and Nowell will face off against each other on the tournament’s first day (July 10), as the Nuggets will play the Bucks at 8:30 p.m., CT on NBA TV. Hawkins and the Warriors will get started on Friday (July 11) against the Portland Trail Blazers at 10 p.m., CT on ESPN2. Nowell and the Bucks will be back in action on Saturday (July 12)...

title: Messi brace buoys Miami in 2-1 MLS victory over New England
creator: AFP AFP
content: Lionel Messi scored twice in the first half of Inter Miami's 2-1 victory over the New England Revolution on Wednesday, continuing a run of form unprecedented in Major League Soccer. The 38-year-old Argentine star has scored two goals in each of his last four MLS games to become the first MLS player to score multiple goals in four straight games. title: Messi brace buoys Miami in 2-1 MLS victory over New England
creator: AFP AFP
content: Lionel Messi scored twice in the first half of Inter Miami's 2-1 victory over the New England Revolution on Wednesday, continuing a run of form unprecedented in Major League Soccer. The 38-year-old Argentine star has scored two goals in each of his last four MLS games to become the first MLS player to score multiple goals in four straight games. He launched the streak in late May with two goals in a 4-2 win over Montreal, followed by two in a 5-1 victory over Columbus. Miami then paused their MLS campaign to compete in the Club World Cup -- where Messi scored one goal in four matches and Miami were eliminated in the round of 16 by Paris Saint-Germain. Javier Mascherano's team returned to MLS action on Saturday with a 4-1 victory at Montreal -- also fueled by a brace from eight-time Ballon d'Or winner Messi. In all Messi has 14 goals in 15 MLS games, putting him two behind leading scorer Sam Surridge, who has appeared in six more games for Nashville than Messi has played this season. "Obviously, Leo is a special player," Mascherano said. "For me he's the best player that has played this sport in history. It's unbelievable how he continues doing things that maybe many years ago we thought that we cannot see at this moment." Messi put Miami up 1-0 in the 27th minute at Gillette Stadium, taking advantage of a Revolution miscue and firing a left-footed shot from the heart of the area. The Argentinian star doubled the score 11 minutes later, charging onto a long through ball from...

title: Abbott y De la Cruz llevan a Rojos a victoria 7-2 sobre Marlins
creator: AP
content: CINCINNATI (AP) — Andrew Abbott lanzó siete innings sin permitir carreras un día después de ser seleccionado para el Juego de Estrellas, el dominicano Elly de la Cruz conectó un par de dobles productores y los Rojos de Cincinnati vencieron el miércoles 7-2 a los Marlins de Miami. Los Marlins vieron cortada una racha de 11 victorias consecutivas como visitantes, un récord de la franquicia. Abbott (8-1) fue nombrado al equipo de Estrellas de la Liga Nacional el martes, reemplazando a Yoshinobu Yamamoto de los Dodgers de Los Ángeles. Contra Miami, Abbott permitió una carrera y seis hits, además de expedir dos bases por bolas y conseguir cinco ponches. El zurdo de 26 años perdió su intento de blanqueada y dejó el juego en el octavo episodio, cuando el dominicano Heriberto Hernández conectó un sencillo impulsor con dos outs. Los Rojos pusieron fin a una racha de cuatro derrotas. Anotaron tres carreras en la primera y cuarta entradas --De la Cruz conectó dobles remolcadores en cada una. El también dominicano Noelvi Marte conectó un jonrón de dos carreras, su cuarto de la temporada, en la cuarta. Will Benson añadió su octavo jonrón en la octava. El manager de los Rojos, Terry Francona, se acercó a tres victorias de las 2.000 en su carrera como piloto. El dominicano Sandy Alcántara (4-9) permitió nueve hits y seis carreras en cinco entradas. Connor Norby conectó su sexto jonrón del año contra Emilio Pagán en el noveno. Por los Marlins, los dominicanos...

title: El Salvador recalls its ambassador from Mexico and disputes origin of drug flight
creator: The Associated Press
content: SAN SALVADOR, El Salvador (AP) — El Salvador President Nayib Bukele recalled his ambassador to Mexico and demanded the country clarify its security chief’s comments that an intercepted plane carrying cocaine had originated in El Salvador. Bukele labeled the information from Mexico Security Secretary Omar García Harfuch as “FALSE” in a post on X, that went on to detail the plane’s alleged flight path. Bukele also pointed out that the three men arrested with the plane were Mexican citizens. “El Salvador does not provide cover for criminals nor does it tolerate drug trafficking,” Bukele wrote. “We didn’t do it before, we will not do it now.” It wasn’t clear late Wednesday if Ambassador Rosa Delmy Cañas had left Mexico yet. On Tuesday, García Harfuch was summarizing drug seizures during the president’s daily news briefing when he spoke of a flight detected in the Pacific coast state of Colima that he said had come from El Salvador. He said 943 pounds (428 kilograms) of cocaine had been seized and three men arrested without providing more detail. Bukele answered Wednesday that he had flight tracking data that showed the plane never entered Salvadoran air space. He demanded Mexico address García Harfuch’s comments. Mexico’s Foreign Affairs ministry said it was reviewing the case when asked for comment.

title: Pirates swept by Kansas City, drop sixth straight game
content: By David Smale Associated PressKANSAS CITY, Mo. — Salvador Perez homered twice, Jac Caglianone hit the longest measured homer by a Royals rookie, and Kansas City beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 4-3 on Wednesday night to complete a three-game sweep.Perez broke a 3-3 tie in the eighth inning with his longball off Isaac Mattson (2-1). He opened the scoring with a 444-foot shot to center in the second.But the most impressive homer of the game belonged to Caglianone — a 466-foot, two-run drive to center in the fourth against Bailey Falter. It was the longest homer by a Royals rookie since Statcast started tracking in 2015 and the fourth-longest by any Kansas City player at Kauffman Stadium.The Royals have won six of seven overall. They did not have a multi-homer game this season before doing it Monday night against Pittsburgh, and now they’ve done it three games in a row. Kansas City hit nine homers in the series.Pittsburgh fell to 0-6 on its nine-game trip ahead of the All-Star break after getting shut out in three straight games at Seattle.Perez had his second multi-homer game of the season and 19th of his career, extending his franchise record.Lucas Erceg (4-2) worked a scoreless eighth and Carlos Estevez pitched the ninth for his 25th save.Ke’Bryan Hayes had a two-run single in the Pirates’ three-run sixth.Key momentPerez sent the first pitch of the eighth to the walkway just short of the fountains in right-center.Key statKansas City swept a series at home for the first time...

title: What is a Blue Alert and why did my phone just go off?
content: DALLAS — The Blue Alert was launched in Texas in 2008 when then-governor Rick Perry signed Executive Order RP-68. It was created to let residents across the state know when an offender who killed or seriously injured a federal, state or local law enforcement officer in the line of duty is on the run. According to DPS, four criteria must be met to issue the alert: A law enforcement officer must have been killed or seriously injured by an offender. The investigating law enforcement agency must determine that the offender poses a serious risk or threat to the public and other law enforcement personnel. A detailed description of the offender's vehicle, vehicle tag, or partial tag must be available for broadcast to the public. The investigating law enforcement agency of jurisdiction must recommend activation of the Blue Alert to the Texas Department of Public Safety (DPS). Texas is one of the 34 states that currently has the system in place. Blue Alerts are distinctly for offenses against law enforcement, unlike AMBER Alerts, which are used to notify the public when a child has been abducted or is in immediate danger, or Silver Alerts, which notify the public when adults, particularly those with cognitive impairments, are missing.

title: AP Entertainment SummaryBrief at 10:52 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Former 'Love Island USA' contestant Cierra Ortega apologizes for using racial slur LOS ANGELES (AP) — Former “Love Island USA” contestant Cierra Ortega has released a video on TikTok apologizing for previously using a racial slur against Asian people. Just a week before the reality show’s finale, Ortega, who was half of one of the season’s strongest couples, left the villa after old posts resurfaced that contained a racial slur against Asian people. Ortega calls her nearly 5 minute video released Wednesday night "an accountability video.” Ortega’s removal from the villa was announced early in Sunday’s episode. Host Iain Stirling said she had left “due to a personal situation.” 'Superman' brings a message of hope to a cynical world LOS ANGELES (AP) — Superman might do more than just save Metropolis. Filmmaker James Gunn hopes the beloved superhero will bring hope to a cynical world. “Superman,” which flies into theaters nationwide Thursday, is a bit of a change in tone for the writer and director who brought a mischievous playfulness and snark to the chaotic worlds of “Suicide Squad” and the “Guardians of the Galaxy." The film is threaded with optimism and what it means to be inherently good as audiences watch the metahuman save the day. Gunn doesn’t just focus on Superman’s humanity but highlights the importance of truth and the power of journalism to fight against injustice. title: Pintu Masuk PN Jakpus Dipasang X-ray Jelang Sidang Pleidoi Hasto Kristiyanto
content: Jakarta Sekjen PDIP Hasto Kristiyanto akan membacakan nota pembelaan atau pleidoi dalam kasus dugaan suap pergantian antar-waktu (PAW) anggota DPR Harun Masiku dan perintangan penyidikan hari ini. Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta pada Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Pusat dijaga ketat pihak kepolisian jelang sidang tersebut. Pantauan detikcom di lokasi, Kamis (10/7/2025), pukul 9.10 WIB, sidang Hasto Kristiyanto dengan agenda pembacaan pleidoi belum dimulai. Mesin X-Ray terpasang di depan pintu masuk pengadilan. Pihak kepolisian juga bersiaga di jalanan depan PN Jakpus. Jalan Bungur Besar Raya juga ditutup sebagian dengan dipasangi barrier. SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT Baca juga: Berkas Lengkap, Marcella Santoso dkk Dilimpahkan ke Kejari Jakpus Hari Ini Juru bicara PN Jakpus, Andi Saputra, mengatakan pengamanan dengan penambahan mesin X-Ray ini bersifat sementara. Dia mengatakan pengamanan ini hanya untuk sidang tertentu sebagai antisipasi hal yang tidak diinginkan. "Untuk sementara aja. Perangkat tersebut dari Polri dalam rangka pengamanan sidang HK untuk mengantisipasi hal-hal yang tidak diinginkan terjadi. Nantinya setiap pengunjung pengadilan akan diperiksa X-Ray. Jadi untuk sidang-sidang tertentu saja, tidak permanen," kata hakim Andi Saputra. ADVERTISEMENT Dia mengatakan setiap pengunjung akan diperiksa melalui mesin X-Ray tersebut. Dia mengatakan pengamanan dilakukan agar sidang berjalan aman dan lancar. "Di mana untuk pengamanan sidang tertentu, PN meminta bantuan pengamanan...

title: AP News Summary at 10:52 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Harrowing stories of rescue emerge from Texas floods as crews search for over 160 reported missing HUNT, Texas (AP) — Texas police described some of the harrowing rescues they conducted after flash floods engulfed camps and homes in the state's Hill Country. An officer who was trapped himself spotted dozens of people stranded on roofs and waded out to bring them to safety. That's according to a fellow officer who spoke Wednesday to a news conference. Another off-duty officer tied a garden hose around his waist so he could reach two people clinging to a tree above swirling floodwaters. More than 160 people still are believed to be missing and at least 118 have died in the floods. The floods are now the deadliest from inland flooding in the U.S. since 1976. Trump tariffs goods from Brazil at 50%, citing 'witch hunt' trial against country's former president WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump is singling out Brazil for import taxes of 50%, citing its treatment of its former president, Jair Bolsonaro. The announcement Wednesday shows that personal grudges rather than simple economics are one of the driving forces behind the U.S. leader’s use of tariffs. Bolsonaro is charged with trying to overturn his 2022 election loss. Trump has described Bolsonaro as a friend and hosted the former Brazilian president at his Mar-a-Lago resort when both were in power in 2020. Brazil's president, Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, said in a statement that Trump's tariff would trigger a retaliatory...

Trump tariffs goods from Brazil at 50%, citing 'witch hunt' trial against country's former president WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump is singling out Brazil for import taxes of 50%, citing its treatment of its former president, Jair Bolsonaro. The announcement Wednesday shows that personal grudges rather than simple economics are one of the driving forces behind the U.S. leader’s use of tariffs. Bolsonaro is charged with trying to overturn his 2022 election loss. Trump has described Bolsonaro as a friend and hosted the former Brazilian president at his Mar-a-Lago resort when both were in power in 2020. Brazil's president, Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, said in a statement that Trump's tariff would trigger a retaliatory...

title: AP News Summary at 10:52 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Harrowing stories of rescue emerge from Texas floods as crews search for over 160 reported missing HUNT, Texas (AP) — Texas police described some of the harrowing rescues they conducted after flash floods engulfed camps and homes in the state's Hill Country. An officer who was trapped himself spotted dozens of people stranded on roofs and waded out to bring them to safety. That's according to a fellow officer who spoke Wednesday to a news conference. Another off-duty officer tied a garden hose around his waist so he could reach two people clinging to a tree above swirling floodwaters. More than 160 people still are believed to be missing and at least 118 have died in the floods. The floods are now the deadliest from inland flooding in the U.S. since 1976.
