title: ‪أمسية تعانق الشعر العربي في تطوان
content: تنظم دار الشعر بتطوان، مساء الجمعة المقبل، تظاهرة “ليلة الشعر العربي” بحديقة مدرسة الصنائع والفنون الوطنية، وذلك في إطار انفتاحها على الأصوات الشعرية العربية وتجسيدا للأفق العربي لمبادرة “بيوت الشعر”. وتشارك في هذه الأمسية الشعرية ثلاثة من الأسماء اللامعة في المشهد الإبداعي العربي، هم الشاعر العراقي حسام الدين النايف، والشاعرة المغربية أمينة الجباري، والشاعر السوداني بحر الدين عبد الله، حيث يقدم كل شاعر تجربته الخاصة التي تعكس تنوع الرؤية الشعرية وتعدد المقاربات الجمالية، وفق خلفياتهم الثقافية وامتداداتهم الجغرافية. ويعد حسام الدين النايف، المقيم بالسويد، عضو اتحاد الأدباء والكتاب العراقيين، أحد أبرز الأصوات التي مثلت الشعر العراقي في المهجر، من خلال أعماله التي تجسد روح الاغتراب وعذابات المنفى، ومنها ديوانه اللافت “أنا لم أمت يا صانع التماثيل”، الذي يمثل تجربة شعرية معاصرة بروح مغامرة ونَفَس منفرد. وتراكم الشاعرة المغربية أمينة الجباري تجربة غنية تجسدت في تسعة دواوين شعرية، من أبرزها “ممرات ضيقة” و”عناق الريح” و”ياسمين تخلع جلباب القبيلة”، “وتبكي القصيدة”، “الفراشات لا تقف على أصابع الأشرار”، وصولا إلى ديوانها الأخير “من قال إننا افترقنا”، وتعكس مسارا شعريا متنوعا يجمع بين الرقة والتمرد والعمق الوجودي. من جانبه يعد بحر الدين عبد الله، الشاعر والدبلوماسي السوداني، أحد الأصوات التي تجمع بين الحضور الثقافي والدور المؤسسي، إذ يشغل منصبا في إدارة منظمة التعاون الإسلامي، كما عمل دبلوماسيا وقنصلا في سفارة بلاده بواشنطن، إلى جانب اشتغاله الأكاديمي كمحاضر بجامعة الخرطوم منذ سنة 2008. ويراكم الدبلوماسي بحر الدين العديد من الجوائز الشعرية المرموقة،...

title: Nationals pitcher Trevor Williams to have surgery for partial UCL tear, out until next season
creator: AP
content: ST. LOUIS (AP) — National right-hander Trevor Williams said Wednesday night that an MRI exam of his elbow revealed a partial tear of the ulnar collateral ligament, and he will undergo surgery next week that will keep him out until at least next season. Williams, who re-signed with Washington on a $14 million, two-year deal last winter, has been limited to only 30 starts over the past two seasons because of arm problems. title: Nationals pitcher Trevor Williams to have surgery for partial UCL tear, out until next season
creator: AP
content: ST. LOUIS (AP) — National right-hander Trevor Williams said Wednesday night that an MRI exam of his elbow revealed a partial tear of the ulnar collateral ligament, and he will undergo surgery next week that will keep him out until at least next season. Williams, who re-signed with Washington on a $14 million, two-year deal last winter, has been limited to only 30 starts over the past two seasons because of arm problems. He was 3-10 with a 6.21 ERA in 17 starts this season, his last coming July 2, when he allowed seven runs on nine hits and a walk in just three innings in a loss to Detroit. The 33-year-old Williams only has a partial tear of the ligament, and the hope is an internal brace procedure will be enough to treat the injury. But orthopedist Jeffrey Dugas, who will perform the surgery next Thursday, said Williams could require Tommy John surgery if the ligament is more damaged than the MRI exam showed. Interim manager Miguel Castro filled Williams' rotation spot last weekend with Shinnosuke Ogasawara, who allowed four runs on seven hits in 2 2/3 innings in his big league debut. Ogasawara is expected to make another start this weekend in Milwaukee. AP MLB: https://apnews.com/hub/MLB

title: Former top-10 player Fabio Fognini announces retirement
creator: Field Level Media
content: Twenty-year ATP veteran and former top-10 player Fabio Fognini announced his retirement from tennis on Wednesday at the All England Club, the site of his final tour-level match. The 38-year-old Italian, who rose to No. 9 in the ATP rankings in 2019, had previously announced that he would retire at the end of the 2025 season, but wound up bidding farewell after a thrilling five-set setback (7-5, 6-7 (5), 7-5, 2-6, 6-1) to Carlos Alcaraz in the first round of Wimbledon on June 30.

title: Jadwal Chelsea vs PSG Final Piala Dunia Antarklub 2025, Ambisi Luis Enrique Ukir Sejarah Baru
content: Chelsea akan dihadapkan pada pertarungan melewan Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) di babak Final Antarklub 2025. Simak jadwal final Piala Dunia Antarklub 2025 Chelsea vs PSG. Baik dan akan sama-sama berduel untuk memperebutkan gelar juara untuk menyempurnakan musim ini. Sebelumnya, lebih dulu melangkah final setelah menaklukkan wakil Brasil, Fluminense pada babak semifinal, Rabu (9/7/2025) kemarin. Dua gol indah dari lesakan Joao Pedro pada menit ke 18' dan 56' mengantarkan The Blues meraih tiket ke final. Kemengan ini membuat berhasil lolos ke final Antarklub sebanyak tiga kali. Chelsea pernah lolos ke final pada edisi 2012 dan 2021. Kala itu The Blues tampil di Antarklub usai juara di Liga Champions. Dengan lolos ke final, bisa mencetak sejarah sebagai klub Inggris pertama yang dua kali juara Antarklub. Pada Antarklub edisi 2012, gagal juara setelah takluk 0-1 dari klub Brasil, Corinthians. Sementara baru satu kali meraih juara di Antarklub 2021 setelah mengalahkan Palmeiras 2-1. Kini selangkah dapat menyempurnakan musim mereka setelah menjuarai UEFA Conference League 2024/2025 beberapa waktu lalu. Meski begitu, upaya untuk juara tentu bakal menemui ujian yang berat. Ia ditantang oleh yang notabene menjadi tim terkuat di turnamen ini.

title: حیدرآباد میں 2 بچے نالے میں ڈوب کر جاں بحق
creator: ویب ڈیسک
content: حیدرآباد کے علاقے شاہ لطیف کالونی میں 2 بچے کھیل کے دوران گٹر نالے میں ڈوب گئے، لاشیں گھر پہنچنے پر کہرام مچ گیا۔ اے آر وائی نیوز کی رپورٹ کے مطابق فاطمہ اور ظفر شام سے لاپتہ تھے تلاش کرنے پر لاشیں گٹر نالے سے ملیں۔ پولیس کے مطابق دونوں بچے شام سے لاپتہ تھے، ڈھونڈنے پر ان کی لاشیں نالے سے ملی، ڈوبنے والےبچوں کی شناخت 3سالہ فاطمہ اور ظفر کے نام سے ہوئی ہے۔ پولیس کا کہنا ہے کہ بچے گٹر نالے کا ڈھکن نہ ہونے کے باعث کھیل کے دوران ڈوب گئے، پولیس واقعہ کی تفتیش چل رہی ہے، میونسپل انتظامیہ سےرابطہ نہیں ہوپا رہا، چند ماہ قبل اسی علاقے میں ایک بچہ گٹر نالے میں ڈوب کر جاں بحق ہوگیا تھا واقعہ ٹاؤن کمیٹی سرمست کی شاہ لطیف کالونی میں پیش آیا، چند ماہ قبل بھی اسی علاقے میں ایک بچہ نالے میں ڈوب کر جاں بحق ہوا تھا۔

title: Dalton Sneed Represents Madison Grant in IFCA North/South All-Star Game
creator: Parker Rodgers The Herald Bulletin
content: INDIANAPOLIS – For Dalton Sneed, representing Madison-Grant in the 59th Annual North/South Football All-Star Classic is more than just a personal achievement — it’s a chance to prove what small-school football is truly made of. The four-year starter and three-time All-Conference lineman will suit up Friday at Decatur Central High School in a prestigious showcase organized by the Indiana Football Coaches Association. The event brings together top graduated seniors from across the state, many hailing from powerhouse 5A and 6A programs — especially on the South team. But Sneed, a 1A standout, has already turned heads in practice. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: Qué es la regla PEMDAS: este es su significado dentro de las matemáticas
content: Desde que asistimos a la escuela, nos enseñan las matemáticas, pues esta disciplina es fundamental en cada aspecto de nuestra vida. Nos enseñan a sumar, restar, multiplicar o dividir, y nos plantean distintas operaciones combinadas para hallar su resultado, pero la mayoría falla por no aplicar la regla PEMDAS. ¿Realmente sabes de qué trata este concepto? En caso tengas dudas, te lo explicaré en esta nota.Cuando no sigues alguna regla o no aplicas la fórmula adecuada en las matemáticas, siempre tendrás el problema de equivocarte por el resultado. Esto generaría que sientas desesperación o consideres que los números son complicadas de resolver, pero en realidad te estás equivocando en el procedimiento.La práctica constante y si tienes interés de aprender sobre los principios básicos de las matemáticas, te llevarán a que tengas un mejor desempeño en cualquier ejercicio o reto numérico. Ahora, te pido que prestes atención a esta regla fundamental de la materia.¿Qué es PEMDAS? Para la Universidad de Auburn, este acrónimo en inglés te revela el orden de las operaciones matemáticas para que sea más fácil cuando desarrolles algún ejercicio numérico. Este es lo que significa cada letra:P: ParéntesisE: ExponentesM: MultiplicacionesD: DivisionesA: Adiciones o SumasS: Sustracciones o RestasEl orden de las operaciones es fundamental si quieres obtener el resultado correcto cuando resuelvas alguna operación combinada. En las escuelas se enseña esta...

The Latest: Brazilian President Lula threatens to suspend economic deals over Trump’s 50% tariffs
creator: By The Associated Press
content: Brazilian President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva said Wednesday that the 50% tariffs announced by U.S. President Donald Trump would trigger the country’s economic reciprocity law. That allows trade, investment and intellectual property agreements to be suspended for countries that harm the South American nation’s competitiveness. “Brazil is a sovereign country with independent institutions that will not accept being taken for granted by anyone,” Lula said. In a forceful statement, he defended the country’s legal system and said the U.S. has had a trade surplus of more than $410 billion with Brazil over the past 15 years.

title: Trump’s NOAA pick stands by budget cuts, calls staffing ‘a top priority’
creator: Scott Dance | The Washington Post
content: President Donald Trump’s nominee to lead the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration told a panel of U.S. senators on Wednesday that he would make it “a top priority” to address staffing shortages caused by recent firings and buyouts at the National Weather Service, while also supporting the administration’s proposal to slash weather and climate research budgets. At a confirmation hearing focused on preventing disasters like the deadly Texas floods, Neil Jacobs proposed improvements including the use of satellites to enhance severe weather warnings and updating NOAA’s weather radios, which use radio signals to broadcast emergency alerts. Jacobs was not asked about specific causes of the Texas floods, but emphasized the need to fully staff all 120 Weather Service forecast offices nationwide. Jacobs indicated the agency’s broad weather and climate research mission could be reduced and refocused on short-term forecasting. He also stressed opportunities for government scientists to collaborate with private industry, a concept promoted in the Republican policy plan Project 2025. When Sen. Ben Ray Luján, D-N.M., asked whether Americans should pay for access to the best forecasting data, Jacobs said no. “I think that that’s an essential service that all Americans deserve,” Jacobs said. Contradicting statements In contrast to Trump’s past claim that human-caused climate change is a “hoax,” Jacobs told Sen. Andy Kim, D-N.J., that he believes humans are influencing Earth’s...

title: Former Jazz coach and GM Frank Layden dies at 93
creator: AP
content: SALT LAKE CITY (AP) — Frank Layden, the sharp-witted former coach who led the Utah Jazz to the playoffs for the first time, has died. He was 93. “Frank Layden made a lasting impact on the Jazz, the state of Utah, and the NBA,” the Jazz said in a statement Wednesday. “There will never be another like him. Our thoughts go out to his family as we join in mourning his loss and celebrating his life. Rest easy, Coach.” Known for his humor and sideline antics, Layden coached the Jazz from 1981-89 and had 277 wins, third-most in franchise history. He's the only coach in Jazz history to be named NBA coach of the year, earning the honor in 1984, when he also was honored as executive of the year. Born in Brooklyn in 1932, Layden began his coaching career in the high school ranks before moving on to coach at his alma mater, Niagara University. He made the jump to the NBA in 1976 on Hubie Brown's staff with the Atlanta Hawks and became the New Orleans Jazz's general manager in 1979. Layden took over as coach after Tom Nissalke was fired midway through the 1981-82 season and led the franchise to its first playoff appearance in his second season. Layden stepped away from coaching early in the 1988-89 season and was replaced by future Hall of Famer Jerry Sloan. Layden stayed on as the team's president and general manager, part of a staff that selected Hall of Famers John Stockton and Karl Malone. He spent one season as coach of the WNBA's Utah Starzz in 1998-99. “It’s hard to imagine the...

content: SALT LAKE CITY (AP) — Frank Layden, the sharp-witted former coach who led the Utah Jazz to the playoffs for the first time, has died. He was 93. “Frank Layden made a lasting impact on the Jazz, the state of Utah, and the NBA,” Wednesday. “There will never be another like him. Our thoughts go out to his family as we join in mourning his loss and celebrating his life. Rest easy, Coach.” Known for his humor and sideline antics, Layden coached the Jazz from 1981-89 and had 277 wins, third-most in franchise history. He's the only coach in Jazz history to be named NBA coach of the year, earning the honor in 1984, when he also was honored as executive of the year. Born in Brooklyn in 1932, Layden began his coaching career in the high school ranks before moving on to coach at his alma mater, Niagara University. He made the jump to the NBA in 1976 on Hubie Brown's staff with the Atlanta Hawks and became the New Orleans Jazz's general manager in 1979. Layden took over as coach after Tom Nissalke was fired midway through the 1981-82 season and led the franchise to its first playoff appearance in his second season. Layden stepped away from coaching early in the 1988-89 season and was replaced by future Hall of Famer Jerry Sloan. Layden stayed on as the team's president and general manager, part of a staff that selected Hall of Famers John Stockton and Karl Malone. He spent one season as coach of the WNBA's Utah Starzz in 1998-99. “It’s hard to imagine the story of the Utah Jazz without...

title: Lotería Nacional: comprobar los números ganadores y décimos del jueves 10 de julio
content: Comprobar Lotería Nacional del jueves 10 de julioComprueba aquí los números ganadores de la Lotería Nacional de este jueves. También revisa los resultados de Bonoloto, La Primitiva y Joker.:icon:20:44 LOTERÍA NACIONAL | Sorteo del jueves Este jueves 10 de julio del 2025, se va a celebrar, a las 21:00 horas, un sorteo de Lotería Nacional desde el Salón de Sorteos de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado por el sistema de bombos múltiples. :icon:20:44 LOTERÍA NACIONAL | ¿Hasta qué hora se puede jugar? El cierre de ventas es a las 12:30 horas de España. :icon:20:43 LOTERÍA NACIONAL | ¿Qué días son el sorteo? El sorteo tiene lugar todos los jueves (21:00 horas de España) y sábados (entre la 13:00 a 14:00 horas de España). :icon:20:43 LOTERÍA NACIONAL | El Bonoloto :icon:20:43 BONOLOTO | ¿Cómo jugar? 1.- Elegir si quieres jugar al siguiente sorteo o a todos los restantes de la semana (hay sorteos de lunes a sábado). 2.- Elegir la combinación de 6 números que deseas jugar o dejar que el sistema te ofrezca una aleatoria. 3.- Puedes jugar hasta 8 combinaciones de 6 números (apuestas sencillas de varios bloques) de una sola vez o una combinación de más números (por ejemplo 7 números, que corresponde a 7 apuestas, o 8 números, que corresponde a 28 apuestas). :icon:20:43 4.- Añadir la combinación o combinaciones deseadas a tu compra. 5.- Continuar y decidir si quieres realizar la misma compra en semanas sucesivas o no. 6.- Revisar todas las opciones y jugar....

title: Contoh RPP dan Modul Ajar PJOK Kelas 3 SD Tahun Ajaran 2025 – 2026 Semester 1
content: TRIBUNPONTIANAK.CO.ID – Contoh RPP dan Modul Ajar PJOK Kelas 3 SD Semester 1 Tahun Ajaran 2025/2026 kini tersedia lengkap dan gratis untuk guru di seluruh Indonesia. Materi ajar ini disusun sesuai Kurikulum Merdeka dengan pendekatan pembelajaran aktif dan menyenangkan. Modul ini mencakup tujuan pembelajaran, langkah kegiatan, serta teknik penilaian yang aplikatif di kelas. Dengan fokus pada gerak dasar, kebugaran jasmani, dan sikap sportivitas, RPP ini mendukung pengembangan profil pelajar Pancasila sejak dini. Guru dapat mengambil dan menyesuaikan modul ajar PJOK kelas 3 semester 1 sesuai kebutuhan peserta didik. Materi ini juga dilengkapi dengan permainan edukatif dan refleksi siswa untuk evaluasi menyeluruh. Temukan contoh RPP PJOK kelas 3 SD semester 1 terbaru 2025/2026 di artikel ini, lengkap dengan panduan praktis. • Contoh RPP dan Modul Ajar Matematika Kelas 3 SD Tahun Ajaran 2025 – 2026 Semester 1 [Cek Berita dan informasi RPP dan Modul KLIK DISINI ] Contoh RPP dan Modul Ajar PJOK Kelas 3 Informasi Umum Modul Ajar PJOK Kelas 3 SD Semester 1 Komponen Keterangan Tujuan Pembelajaran PJOK Kelas 3 Semester 1 Contoh RPP PJOK Kelas 3 SD Semester 1 Kurikulum Merdeka Terbaru 2025/2026 RPP PJOK Kelas 3 – Materi: Gerak Lokomotor (Lari, Melompat, dan Meluncur)
